## Protocol.HeapProfiler.TakeHeapSnapshotRequest.treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots property

If true, a raw snapshot without artifical roots will be generated

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
treatGlobalObjectsAsRoots?: boolean;
```
